caption.title: How daily increment in movement speed impacts basic reproduction numbers.
caption.p:
(a) Instantaneously global reproduction number; (b)-(d) Instantaneously local reproduction numbers in patches 1, 2 and 3. In (b)-(d),
km per day, described by solid, dashed and dotted lines, respectively. (e) Local reproduction number in patches 1, 2 and 3 are simulated by solid, dashed and dotted lines when
km per day. Values of other parameters are identical with those used in Fig. 3.
